DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to evaluate the levels of CP-690,550 in the blood of healthy Chinese subjects following both single doses and multiple doses of drug.
DOC.brief_title: CP-690,550 Pharmacokinetics In Healthy Chinese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Chinese Volunteers No evidence of active or latent or inadequately treated infection with Mycobacterium tuberculosis (TB) Clinically significant infections within the past 3 months Positive screening test for hepatitis B surface antigen, antihepatitis C antibody, or human immunodeficiency virus Pregnant or nursing women
